description: A TypeScript MCP server for Home Assistant, enabling programmatic management of entities, automations, services, and dashboards. Designed for extensibility. Includes Docker support and Vitest-based tests for easy deployment and reliability.

debugMode.description: Enable debug mode for verbose logging

LIMIT_RESOURCES.description: Limit the number of resources to convert, -1 for no limit

capabilities.name: get-rest-automation-trace
capabilities.description: Fetches the trace for a specific automation run using its REST id and run id.

capabilities.name: list-rest-automation-traces
capabilities.description: List all traces for a specific automation using its REST id.

capabilities.name: list-automations
capabilities.description: List all automations

capabilities.name: delete-automation
capabilities.description: Delete an automation by id

capabilities.name: get-automation-by-entity-id
capabilities.description: Find an automation entity using its entity_id (e.g. automation.my_automation).

capabilities.name: get-rest-automation-by-entity-id
capabilities.description: Get an automation's REST definition using its entity_id (e.g. automation.my_automation).

capabilities.name: update-automation-by-entity-id
capabilities.description: Update an automation using its entity_id (e.g. automation.my_automation).

capabilities.name: get-automation-by-rest-id
capabilities.description: Find an automation entity using its REST API id (rest_id, not entity_id).

capabilities.name: get-rest-automation-by-rest-id
capabilities.description: Get an automation's REST definition using its rest_id (REST API id, not entity_id).

capabilities.name: update-rest-automation-by-rest-id
capabilities.description: Update an automation using its rest_id (REST API id, not entity_id).

capabilities.name: delete-rest-automation-by-rest-id
capabilities.description: Delete an automation using its rest_id (REST API id, not entity_id).

capabilities.name: create-rest-automation
capabilities.description: Create a new automation via the Home Assistant REST API. Returns the new rest_id.

capabilities.name: list-device-automation-triggers
capabilities.description: List all triggers for a specific device's automations.

capabilities.name: get-status
capabilities.description: Get Home Assistant connection status

capabilities.name: validate-config
capabilities.description: Validate triggers, conditions and actions configurations as if part of an automation. Any changes to automation should be checked with this tool

capabilities.name: call-service
capabilities.description: Call a Home Assistant service

capabilities.name: get-manifest
capabilities.description: Get the manifest of a Home Assistant integration

capabilities.name: get-entity-registry-by-entity-id
capabilities.description: Get registry info for a specific entity_id

capabilities.name: get-device-id-by-entity-id
capabilities.description: Get the device_id for a given entity_id

capabilities.name: get-config-entry-id-by-entity-id
capabilities.description: Get the config_entry_id for a given entity_id, useful for templated sensors and other config entry flows alike

capabilities.name: update-device-registry
capabilities.description: Update the device registry for a specific device_id

capabilities.name: create-config-entry-flow
capabilities.description: Create a new config entry in the Home Assistant entity registry for a new config entry (new templated helpers for ex)

capabilities.name: continue-config-entry-flow
capabilities.description: Continue an existing config entry flow with a next step Id

capabilities.name: finish-config-entry-flow
capabilities.description: Finish an existing config entry flow

capabilities.name: create-config-entry-options-flow
capabilities.description: Create a new config entry options flow for a specific config entry (already existing config entry, templated helpers for ex)

capabilities.name: update-config-entry-options-flow
capabilities.description: Update an existing config entry options flow

capabilities.name: list-config-entry-flows-helpers
capabilities.description: List available config entry flow handlers for helpers

capabilities.name: list-scripts
capabilities.description: List all scripts in Home Assistant, friendly_name = alias

capabilities.name: get-rest-script-by-entity-id
capabilities.description: Get the details of a specific script by its entity_id

capabilities.name: get-rest-script-by-alias
capabilities.description: Get the details of a specific script by its alias, not script.entity_id

capabilities.name: upsertScriptRest-rest-script-by-alias
capabilities.description: Create or Update the details of a specific script by its alias

capabilities.name: delete-rest-script-by-alias
capabilities.description: Delete a specific script by its alias

capabilities.name: list-entities-by-prefix
capabilities.description: List all Home Assistant entities by prefix

capabilities.name: list-entities-by-regex
capabilities.description: List all Home Assistant entities matching a regex pattern

capabilities.name: get-entity-state
capabilities.description: Get state of a specific entity_id

capabilities.name: get-entity-domain
capabilities.description: Get domain of a specific entity_id

capabilities.name: search-related
capabilities.description: Search for entities related to a specific item_type (like 'area') and entity_id (like 'studio')

capabilities.name: list-area
capabilities.description: List all Home Assistant areas

capabilities.name: get-lovelace-config
capabilities.description: Fetch Lovelace dashboard config by url_path. The URL must contain a dash ('-') and must not contain spaces or special characters, except '_' and '-'

capabilities.name: update-lovelace-config
capabilities.description: Update Lovelace dashboard config by url_path.

capabilities.name: list-lovelace-dashboards
capabilities.description: List all Lovelace dashboards.

capabilities.name: create-lovelace-dashboard
capabilities.description: Create a new Lovelace dashboard.

capabilities.name: delete-lovelace-dashboard
capabilities.description: Delete a Lovelace dashboard by dashboard_id.

capabilities.name: get-lovelace-resources
capabilities.description: Fetch Lovelace resources.
